nodes.text: Star Wars Masterpieces is a 1997 collection of five Star Wars video games from the LucasArts Entertainment Company. The collected games, which come packaged in a collectible case, include Star Wars: Rebel Assault, Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire, Star Wars: Dark Forces (three levels), Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II (playable demo), and the program Star Wars: Making Magic.
